= Introduction =
*Zinwell* is a [Taiwan Taiwanese] electronic company.

It is one of the main suppliers of hardware for [NewZealand New Zealand]'s digital television network [Freeview].

Two of the machines they make are the [ZMT-620HD Zinwell ZMT-620HD] and the [ZMT-640PVR Zinwell ZMT-640PVR].
